Paragraph: On the other hand , nocistatin is recently isolated from the same precursor as nociceptin and blocks nociceptin - induced allodynia and hyperalgesia .

In this paragraph, the diseases mentioned are "allodynia" and "hyperalgesia". Allodynia refers to pain caused by non-painful stimuli, while hyperalgesia refers to an increased sensitivity to pain.
